code.description: The error code parsed from the body of the http error response.

details.description: The list of invalid fields send in request, in case of validation error.

message.description: The error message parsed from the body of the http error response.

info.description: JSON-serialized string containing additional information of the type of error that occured.

type.description: Type of error that occured (e.g., PolicyViolation, SecurityViolation).
